content:
回归函数:
$$f_{w,b}(x) = wx + b$$ 代价函数:
$$J(w,b) = \frac{1}{2m}\sum_{i=1}^m(f_{w,b}(x_i)-y_i)^2$$ 梯度下降法同时更新w和b:
$$tmp_w=w-\alpha\frac{\partial J(w,b)}{\partial w}=w-\alpha\frac{1}{m}\sum_{i=1}^m(f_{w,b}(x_i)-y_i)x_i$$ $$tmp_b=b-\alpha\frac{\partial J(w,b)}{\partial b}=b-\alpha\frac{1}{m}\sum_{i=1}^m(f_{w,b}(x_i)-y_i)$$ $$w = tmp_w$$ $$b = tmp_b$$ \(\alpha\)是学习率,用来控制下降幅度
summary: 回归函数: $$f_{w,b}(x) = wx + b$$ 代价函数: $$J(w,b) = \frac{1}{2m}\sum_{i=1}^m(f_{w,b}(x_i)-y_i)^2$$ 梯度下降法同时更新w和b
title: 一元线性回归
